mapper.select: SELECT meet_no, meet_poster, meet_charge, meet_cg, TO_CHAR(to_date(meet_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'),'YY/MM/DD') as meet_start, TO_CHAR(to_date(meet_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'),'YY/MM/DD') as meet_end, meet_subject, meet_like, num FROM (SELECT meet_no, meet_poster, meet_charge, meet_cg, meet_start, meet_end, meet_subject, meet_like, rownum as num FROM (SELECT meet_no, meet_poster, meet_charge, meet_cg, meet_start, meet_end, meet_subject, meet_like FROM meeting ORDER BY meet_no ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
